name: soundwave-festival-tailwind-capstone
description: SoundWave Festival 2025 - Tailwind CSS Mini Capstone Project for Madagascar students

scripts.start: echo 'Open starter-files/index.html in your web browser to begin!' && echo 'For live development, consider using Live Server extension in VS Code'
scripts.test: echo 'Testing checklist: Open tests/visual-checklist.md and verify each item manually in your browser'
scripts.serve: python3 -m http.server 8000 || python -m http.server 8000 || echo 'Install Python to use local server, or open index.html directly in browser'
scripts.validate: echo 'Manual validation: 1) Open browser dev tools, 2) Check responsive design, 3) Verify no console errors, 4) Test all breakpoints'

author: Onja Madagascar

config.development_server: Live Server (VS Code extension) or Python http.server

setup: 1. Open starter-files/index.html in VS Code or your preferred editor
2. Open the same file in your web browser
3. Keep both open side by side for live editing
4. Follow the instructions in the HTML comments
testing: 1. Run 'npm test' to see the manual testing checklist
2. Open browser dev tools (F12) to inspect elements
3. Test responsive design by resizing browser window
4. Use device simulation in dev tools for mobile testing
help: - Read README.md for complete project overview
- Use tests/visual-checklist.md to verify your progress
- solution/ folder contains complete reference (use only if stuck!)
